    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PowerMockJUnit49RunnerDelegateImpl

    public class PowerMockJUnit47RunnerDelegateImpl
extends PowerMockJUnit44RunnerDelegateImpl
    Extends the functionality of PowerMockJUnit44RunnerDelegateImpl to enable the usage of rules.
